biotools.summary:
Features an nnU-Net based segmentation tool capable of performing HCC segmentation for both arterial and portal venous phase in polyphasic contrast-enhanced abdominal CT.

Please be mindful that the usage instructions below are for the image in the EUCAIM Harbor.

bioschemas.name: HCC segmentation tool for contrast-enhanced abdominal CT
bioschemas.summary:
Features an nnU-Net based segmentation tool capable of performing HCC segmentation for both arterial and portal venous phase in polyphasic contrast-enhanced abdominal CT.

Please be mindful that the usage instructions below are for the image in the EUCAIM Harbor.
